{{Lang|'''Kamisato Ayato'''|ja=神里綾人}} is a playable [[Hydro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

He is the current head of the [[Kamisato Clan]], the older brother of [[Kamisato Ayaka]], and the [[Yashiro Commission]]er.
